alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Randolph; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 30 at 1:08PM CST until January 01 at 12:43AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Tallapoosa River At Wadley affecting Chambers, Randolph and Tallapoosa Counties. .Heavy rainfall of 2 to 4 inches has occurred withing the past 24 hours over the Tallapoosa River Basin basin and a flood warning is now in effect for the Tallapoosa River near Wadley. Another statement will be issued by late tonight, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tallapoosa River At Wadley. * WHEN...From this evening to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flooding of pasture lands in the area occurs and cattle and farm equipment should be moved to higher ground if higher stages are forecast. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM CST Thursday the stage was 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 13.8 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
